tagline: Protecting Your Home from Top to Bottom
description: Premier roofing contractor serving residential and commercial clients for over 20 years with quality craftsmanship, reliable service, and comprehensive roofing solutions including repairs, replacements, and inspections.

about.story: Founded in 2003 by master roofer Mike Johnson, Summit Roofing Solutions has built a reputation as Denver's most trusted roofing contractor. Starting as a small family business, we've grown to become the region's leading roofing specialists while maintaining our commitment to quality craftsmanship and personal service. Our team of certified professionals brings over 200 years of combined experience to every project.
about.mission: To protect Colorado homes and businesses with superior roofing solutions, honest pricing, and unmatched customer service that builds lasting relationships.
